title: Clubs
body: I had a club before they stopped working now I cant remake my original club because it says its taken is there a way you can delete it so i can remake it with my friends???????

replies.body: We've been tracking and investigating clubs issues since it's recovered from [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your specific case individually.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
